text: José María Hurtado Ruiz-Tagle (5 March 1945 – 24 September 2018) was a Chilean politician. He was born in Santiago de Chile. He was a member of the National Renewal (RN) party and a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Chile between 1990 and 1998. Hurtado Ruiz-Tagle died on 24 September 2018 in Santiago, aged 73.Falleció José María Hurtado, ex-diputado por Colchagua y alcalde de Palmilla designado por Pinochet ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Chile Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Politicians from Santiago
title: José María Hurtado Ruiz-Tagle
